title: 40 years in prison to sell cannabis, 17 years to join the Taliban?
subtitle: Mimi compares the sentences handed down to John Walker Lind, the white American known as the "American Taliban," and the black resident Michigan Michael Alonzo Thompson.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: We're analyzing the factual allegations by the "last 98%" on the cases of John Walker Lind and Michael Alonzo Thompson.
